name: crrei
body: |- wceq(cfv(cre, co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1))), c0)

stmt.origin: mp2an(wceq(cfv(cre, co(c0, caddc, co(ci, cmul, c1))), c0), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))

comment: The real part of a complex number representation. Definition 10-3.1 of [Gleason] p. 132. (Contributed by NM, 10-May-1999.)
